title: Organized several dry ration packs & stationery donations programs
shorttext: we organized several dry ration packs & stationery donations programs in every center under the Emergency relief program(Newly initiated project by FLCF)for poor & affected families from Covid-19 virus.
htmltext:
we organized several dry ration packs & stationery donations programs in every center under the Emergency relief program(Newly initiated project by FLCF)for poor & affected families from Covid-19 virus.

We thank all individual and corporate donors who donated for particular centers and particular month and programs. We appreciate your dedication even in this pandemic time.

title: Feed a Family 2021 - Dry ration distribution project
shorttext: Our dry ration distribution project for year 2021 coincided with the Covid-19 situation. With the assistance of our donors and partners, we have distributed over 20,000 dry ratio packs to deserving families around the Sri Lanka.
htmltext:
Our dry ration distribution project for year 2021 coincided with the Covid-19 situation. With the assistance of our donors and partners, we have distributed over 20,000 dry ratio packs to deserving families around the Sri Lanka.

These dry ration packs were distributed in Nikaweratiya, Trincomalee, Welimada, Galgamuwa and several areas around Colombo, in partnership with local partners in each area. All government recommended safety guidelines were followed throughout this distribution process.

title: Mohan Lanka Foundation donates sewing machinese
shorttext: Under the guidance of Mohan Lanka Foundation, many self-employment generation programmes have been implemented to empower Gampaha District women.
htmltext:
Under the guidance of Mohan Lanka Foundation, many self-employment generation programmes have been implemented to empower Gampaha District women

Parallel to this programme 50 sewing machines were donated among self employment women in the Northern District at a ceremony held recently
